|brand = Zonet |model = ZSR0104CP |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88E6218;88E6218-LG0, B32080.2, 0535 B1P, TW; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 946E-S |cpu1spd = 150 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV400BTC-70; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16100-7T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = Netcore |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/27267-cheaprouterroundup?showall=&start=9 On '''SmallNetBuilder''''s ''Cheap Router Roundup'' circa 2006] :"PB-841-M02F-00", "MAR 07 2005", and a date code of '''0548''' (Dec. 2005) is silkscreened on the board. This is a '''Netcore''' manuf'ed device.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Zonet zsr0104cp.jpg| File:Zonet zsr0104cp rear.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Zonet zsr0104cp board big.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
